definition: Arecaceae or Palmae, the palm family
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Brazilian palm of genus euterpe whose buds are eaten like cabbage when young.
sentences.chinese: 巴西棕榈科植物叶芽如卷心菜嫩时可食。

sentences.english: Another variant is presented by some members of the Palmae.
sentences.chinese: 在一些棕榈科成员中还存在另一种变体。

sentences.english: Besides palmaceous plants such as coconut, Palm leaf beetle Brontispa longissim(Gestro) also endangers banana.
sentences.chinese: 椰心叶甲除危害椰子等棕榈科植物外，还危害香蕉。

definition: Myrtaceae (family including myrtle, rosemary, oregano etc)
Euphorbiaceae (plant family including rubber and cassava)
Anacardiaceae, plant family including lac tree (Rhus vernicifera) 漆樹|漆树[qi1 shu4]
Sterculiaceae, family of Malvale trees incl. Cacao, Cola and Firmiana
Labiatae, the taxonomic family including lavender, mint
